title: Fixed 'click to interact' on mobile
description: Fixes the "click to interact" functionality on mobile devices by adding support for touch events.

title: fixed the colorOverrides type
description: Fixed the type of `colorOverrides` property

title: transparent background necessary for customization
description: Adds transparent background for customization in the SchematicViewer component.

title: fix: touch to interact work on mobile
description: Fixes the "touch to interact" functionality on mobile devices.

title: Add `source_missing_property_error` element
description: Adds a new `source_missing_property_error` element to the `any_source_component` union type and exports it in the `index.ts` file.

title: Introduce are_pins_interchangeable on source component base
description: Introduce a new property `are_pins_interchangeable` on the `source_component_base` type.

title: Commit new readme after running script
description: Commit new readme after running script to regenerate the table of contents for the readme file.

title: Added CircuitJsonError Type
description: Added a new type, `CircuitJsonError`, that represents different types of errors that can occur in a CircuitJSON file.

title: feat: add support pill, oval and rotated rect solder paste
description: Adds support for pill, oval, and rotated rectangular solder paste shapes in the `pcb_solder_paste` type.

title: Add diode variants variant=[zener, schottky, photo, tvs]
description: Adds support for different diode variants (Zener, Schottky, Photo, TVS) with corresponding boolean flags and validation.

title: ci: update GitHub Actions workflows to use latest versions
description: Update GitHub Actions workflows to use latest versions of actions/checkout, oven-sh/setup-bun, and actions/setup-node

title: ci: update GitHub Actions to use latest versions of actions/checkout and setup-bun
description: Updates GitHub Actions to use the latest versions of `actions/checkout` (v4) and `oven-sh/setup-bun` (v2).

title: fixed trace going into symbol
description: Adding a border around the schematic to fix trace going into symbol

title: Output PCB Solder Paste Objects for each Smtpad and Plated hole
description: Adds solder paste objects for each SMT pad and plated hole in the PCB design.

title: fix double schematic trace 2
description: Fix double schematic trace

title: removed build step from typecheck workflow
description: Removed the build step from the typecheck workflow, making it faster to run.

title: introduced a smoke test to verify dist after build
description: Introduced a smoke test to verify the generated distribution after building the project.

title: Revert "fixed double schematic traces"
description: Revert a previous change that fixed double schematic traces.

title: fixed double schematic traces
description: Fixed double schematic traces

title: draw drc errors that involve vias
description: Adds support for drawing DRC errors that involve vias in the PCB trace error visualization.

title: update circuit-json dependencies and fix error
description: Update circuit-json dependencies and fix error

title: exported type ColorOverrides
description: Exported a new type `ColorOverrides` to be used in the `Options` interface.

title: export colormap type
description: Exports the ColorMap type from the utils/colors module.

title: override any schematic color
description: Override any schematic color

title: ci: update GitHub Actions to use latest versions of checkout, setup-bun, and setup-node
description: Update all GitHub Actions workflows to use the latest versions of actions/checkout (v4), oven-sh/setup-bun (v2), and actions/setup-node (v4) to ensure compatibility and leverage the latest features and improvements.

title: fix: Add destructive toast variant for download error
description: Add a destructive toast variant for download error

title: modify the fake error response and update runframe
description: Modify the fake error response and update the runframe dependency to version 0.0.403

title: Handle package transpilation step and show the error message
description: Handles the package transpilation step and shows the error message if any.

title: chore: fix route
description: Fix the route in the `EditorNav` component

title: feat(search): add package search functionality
description: Add package search functionality

title: simplified fsMap that would be passed to runframe
description: Simplifies the `fsMap` object that is passed to the `runframe` function.

title: Added syntax highlighter to package-port/CodeEditor
description: Added syntax highlighter to the package-port/CodeEditor component.

title: feat(important-files-view): add copy button for active file content
description: Add a copy button to the important files view component to allow users to copy the content of the active file.

title: refactor(EditorNav): remove unused hasUnrunChanges prop
description: Removed the unused `hasUnrunChanges` prop from the `EditorNav` component.

title: Switch to the stripe prod url
description: Switches the Stripe checkout base URL from the test environment to the production environment.

title: chore: runframe
description: Upgrade the `@tscircuit/runframe` package to version `0.0.391`.

title: fix(CodeEditor): correct tooltip text and preserve scroll position
description: Update the tooltip text and preserve the scroll position when updating the editor content.

title: feat(view-package): pass file_path to onEditClicked handler
description: The change modifies the `onEditClicked` handler to accept an optional `file_path` parameter and include it in the navigation URL, allowing for more precise editing of specific files within the package.

title: refactor(CodeAndPreview): fix package files not saving for new package
description: The PR refactors the `CodeAndPreview` component to extract the logic for handling package visibility changes into a separate function to improve code maintainability and reduce redundancy.

title: chore: runframe
description: Update the `@tscircuit/runframe` dependency to version `0.0.390`.

title: remove edit beta
description: Remove the "Edit Package" button with the "BETA" label from the dropdown menu.

title: chore: runframe
description: Update the `@tscircuit/runframe` dependency to version `0.0.389`.

title: chore: runframe update
description: Updates the "@tscircuit/runframe" dependency to version 0.0.388

title: Update schema and endpoint of orderQuote to match with the new registry schema
Upgrade vite disable terser
description: Upgrade Vite and disable Terser

title: /editor now points to the PackageEditor, update RunFrame, skip broken test
description: Update the `/editor` route to point to the `PackageEditorPage` and add a new `/legacy-editor` route to the `EditorPage`.

title: fixed rendering of double boards
description: Fixed the rendering of double boards in the PCB viewer.

title: remove ~$50 from order button
description: Removes the "$50" text from the order button.

title: added a tooltip in fork and star buttons if the user is not logged in
description: Added a tooltip in fork and star buttons if the user is not logged in.

title: refactor: build-status component
description: Refactor the build-status component to simplify the rendering logic.

title: Add build status for the circuit-json
description: Adds a new test case to check if the `circuit_json_build_error` field is returned correctly when it exists.

title: Add specific errors from failure to UI
description: Add specific errors from failure to the UI and display them in a modal.

title: add report-outage.json file to ignore so it should not format
description: Add `reported-outages.json` to the list of ignored files in the `biome.json` configuration.

title: Add discord notifications when there is an outage last more than 20 min
description: Add logic to check for outages lasting more than 20 minutes and send Discord notifications for new outages.

title: fix: improve mobile responsiveness for status bars and uptime history
description: Improve mobile responsiveness for status bars and uptime history

title: add format and typecheck workflows
feat: health checks for SVG, PNG, and browser preview services
description: Adds health checks for SVG, PNG, and browser preview services.

title: Add status check for compile.tscircuit.com
description: Add status check for compile.tscircuit.com

title: feat(types): add mainComponentPath option to executeWithFsMap
description: This pull request introduces a new `mainComponentPath` option to the `executeWithFsMap` method in the `CircuitWebWorker` type, allowing users to specify the main component file when executing with a filesystem map. Additionally, new tests are added to verify the functionality of custom components with FSMap, including handling file not found errors and verifying maximum components.

title: fix build:runner to bundle parts engine
description: Fix the `build:runner` script to bundle the `@tscircuit/parts-engine` dependency.

title: Display error when create order_quote fails
description: Adds error handling and display when creating an order quote fails.

title: dark reader extension friendly colors
description: Adds custom color overrides for the schematic preview in the CircuitJsonPreview component to make it compatible with dark reader extensions.

title: feat(RunFrame): add support for custom main component path && updated eval
description: Add support for custom main component path in the RunFrame component and update the eval dependency.

title: switched to circuit-json CircuitJsonError type
description: Switched to the `circuit-json` library's `CircuitJsonError` type instead of the previously used `getCircuitJsonErrors` function.

title: fix:Some errors aren't shown in the error tab & support for multi errors [nextJS] style.
description: Fix some errors not shown in the error tab and add support for multiple errors in the [nextJS] style.

title: add failing message on dialog
description: Add a failing message on the order dialog when there is an error fetching the quotes.

title: show error message when the error is there in the response
description: The pull request adds an error message display when there is an error in the response.

title: Remove the shipping option for now
description: Removes the shipping option from the order dialog

title: fix: updated the previous `total_cost` to the new field
description: Update the previous `total_cost` to the new field `total_cost_without_shipping`

title: Use a globally stored tip in PreviewEmptyState to prevent re-renders from changing content
description: Use a globally stored tip in PreviewEmptyState to prevent re-renders from changing content

title: handle INSTALL_PACKAGE and emit corresponding events
description: The pull request introduces a new function `addPackage` that handles the installation of a tscircuit component package, including handling different package name formats, ensuring the `.npmrc` file is configured, and using the appropriate package manager. It also adds event handling for `INSTALL_PACKAGE` events, triggering the `handleInstallPackage` function to install the package.

title: chore: bump ci actions versions
description: Bump the versions of the GitHub Actions used in the publish workflow

title: add format and typecheck workflows
description: Add format and typecheck workflows

title: Add build, format and format:check scripts
description: Add build, format and format:check scripts

title: Make tests run on ci, update core and eval
description: This pull request makes tests run on CI, updates the core and eval libraries, and adds some new GitHub Actions workflows.

title: Speedup Pathing solver by re-using the nodeEdgeMap
description: The pull request optimizes the pathing solver by reusing the nodeEdgeMap, reducing the runtime of the keyboard5 use case from 8.39s to 3.72s (-55%).

title: Capacity Pathing split into 2 stages, integrate new HD PolyLine, ledmatrix4 working again, add failing case for new HD Polyline, % time spent per stage. Add stats for pathingOptimizer. Display stats in autorouting debugger
description: Capacity Pathing split into 2 stages, integrate new HD PolyLine, ledmatrix4 working again, add failing case for new HD Polyline, % time spent per stage. Add stats for pathingOptimizer. Display stats in autorouting debugger.

title: New MultiHead Polyline Solver with better/faster initial via possibilities generation
description: Introduce a new MultiHead Polyline Solver with better/faster initial via possibilities generation.

title: Hyper Capacity Pathing (Attempt 2)
description: Adds a new component, "ViaPossibilitiesDebugger", that visualizes the via possibilities for a given "NodeWithPortPoints".
